title: Senior Content Marketing Manager
description: Keren is a Senior Content Marketing expert with over 7 years of experience in content creation and enjoys writing varies types of content - because who doesn’t like variety? When she’s not deeply immersed in a piece of content, you can find her listening to a true crime podcast, running after her son, looking for her next brunch spot, or enjoying the latest TV series. Keren originally hails from New York and has a Bachelor of Science in English Literature from SUNY Oneonta (Yes, you read that right, a BSc).
